definition: sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid

sentences.english: It had significant difference compared with the lactic acid bacteria fermented soybean milk.
sentences.chinese: 与乳酸菌发酵豆乳相比，口感有明显的区别。

sentences.english: The technology of lactic acid fermented Inonotus Obliquus beverage has been studied in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 对桦褐孔菌乳酸菌饮料的工艺进行研究。

sentences.english: It was only the yogurt or cultured milk products with lactic acid bacteria.
sentences.chinese: 就系得酸奶酪同酸奶制品有乳酸菌架咋。

sentences.english: Hunan Taizinai Group Company is the largest group which make ferment lactobacillus milk drink.
sentences.chinese: 太子奶集团是中国最大的发酵型乳酸菌奶饮集团。

sentences.english: Besides, blank control cultured without lactic acid bacteria was established.
sentences.chinese: 另设不接种乳酸菌培养的空白对照。

sentences.english: Freeze-drying is a key technology during the production of starter culture of lactic acid bacteria.
sentences.chinese: 冷冻干燥是生产商品化乳酸菌发酵剂的一项关键技术。

sentences.english: Study on salinized store and forming acid synamics model of Chinese Toon;
sentences.chinese: 探讨了香椿芽接种乳酸菌，低盐快速发酵的新工艺。

sentences.english: The fat globules and lactobacilli were inlaid in thetridimensional fibronet structure.
sentences.chinese: 脂肪球和乳酸菌镶嵌于凝胶体纤维网中。

sentences.english: Development of food-grade vector is the key point to exploit the potential application of lactic acid bacteria.
sentences.chinese: 构建食品级载体是开发乳酸菌潜在应用价值的关键。

sentences.english: Add milk and live lactobacillus into a plastic cup and then cover it with a lid.
sentences.chinese: 将牛奶和活乳酸菌加进一个胶杯内，并用盖密封。

sentences.english: Relaxation of smooth muscle tissue was compared with the action of the bacterium.
sentences.chinese: 平滑肌的放松是和乳酸菌的行为是一致的。

sentences.english: The effects of inoculated lactic acid bacteria on pickling process and quality of sweet and sour Allium chinense was discussed.
sentences.chinese: 探讨了接种乳酸菌对甜酸藠头腌制工艺和品质的影响。

sentences.english: The performance of lactic acid bacteria has important influence on the quality of fermented yoghourt.
sentences.chinese: 乳酸菌菌种的性能对发酵型酸奶的品质具有重要影响。

sentences.english: SM brought me the lactobacillus(Yogourmet) for making yogurt.
sentences.chinese: 希明给我带来乳酸菌做优酪乳。

sentences.english: The Lactobacillus finds a new home, and we're no longer up tight.
sentences.chinese: 乳酸菌找到了一个新家，我们之间的关系不再紧张了。

sentences.english: A new process for Chinese toon sprouts lactic acid fermentation by inoculating L.
sentences.chinese: 探讨了香椿芽接种乳酸菌，低盐快速发酵的新工艺。

definition: Bacillus subtilis (formerly Bacillus natto), a common soil bacterium
